attributes.action: resign. This is a call for UK citizens to vote "No Confidence" in this government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have no confidence in New Labours fiscal policies, and former chancellor Browns claims of fiscal prudence lie in tatters around Darlings feet. Do the honourable thing and resign. If you really believe you have the backing of the people, what have you got to lose?

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/DoUsALLaFavour/
Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
